io.sphere.client.shop

Interface OrderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderServiceImpl

    public interface OrderService
    Sphere HTTP API for working with orders in a given project.

    • Method Summary

      CommandRequest<Order> updatePaymentState(VersionedId orderId, PaymentState paymentState)

      since 0.51.0, use updateOrder(io.sphere.client.model.VersionedId, io.sphere.client.shop.model.OrderUpdate) instead, e.g. updateOrder(orderId, new OrderUpdate().setPaymentState(paymentState));.

      Deprecated. 
      since 0.51.0, use updateOrder(io.sphere.client.model.VersionedId, io.sphere.client.shop.model.OrderUpdate) instead, e.g. updateOrder(orderId, new OrderUpdate().setShipmentState(shipmentState));.

QueryRequest<Order> all()

      • updatePaymentState

        @Deprecated
CommandRequest<Order> updatePaymentState(VersionedId orderId,
                                                  PaymentState paymentState)
        Deprecated. since 0.51.0, use updateOrder(io.sphere.client.model.VersionedId, io.sphere.client.shop.model.OrderUpdate) instead, e.g. updateOrder(orderId, new OrderUpdate().setPaymentState(paymentState));.
        Sets the payment state of an order.

      • updateShipmentState

        @Deprecated
CommandRequest<Order> updateShipmentState(VersionedId orderId,
                                                   ShipmentState shipmentState)
        Deprecated. since 0.51.0, use updateOrder(io.sphere.client.model.VersionedId, io.sphere.client.shop.model.OrderUpdate) instead, e.g. updateOrder(orderId, new OrderUpdate().setShipmentState(shipmentState));.
        Sets the shipment state of an order.

      • updateOrder

        CommandRequest<Order> updateOrder(VersionedId orderId,
                                OrderUpdate orderUpdate)
        Updates the order, e.g. the payment state, the shipment state or the parcel tracking data.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the versioned id of the order to update
        orderUpdate - the changes to be applied
        Returns:
        a command that needs to be executed to perform the changes

      • createOrder

        CommandRequest<Order> createOrder(VersionedId cartId)
        Creates an order based on a cart, and deletes the cart. The created order object has the same id as the cart it was created from.
        Returns:
        A command request which can fail with the following exceptions:
        • OutOfStockException if some of the products in the cart are not available anymore. This can only happen if the cart is in the ReserveOnOrder mode.
        • PriceChangedException if the price, tax or shipping of some line items changed since the items were added to the cart.

      • createOrder

        CommandRequest<Order> createOrder(VersionedId cartId,
                                PaymentState paymentState)
        Creates an order based on a cart, and deletes the cart. The created order object has the same id as the cart it was created from.
        Returns:
        A command request which can fail with the following exceptions:
        • OutOfStockException if some of the products in the cart are not available anymore. This can only happen if the cart is in the ReserveOnOrder mode.
        • PriceChangedException if the price, tax or shipping of some line items changed since the items were added to the cart.

      • createOrder

        CommandRequest<Order> createOrder(CreateOrderBuilder builder)
        Creates an order based on a cart, and deletes the cart. The created order object has the same id as the cart it was created from.
        Returns:
        A command request which can fail with the following exceptions:
        • OutOfStockException if some of the products in the cart are not available anymore. This can only happen if the cart is in the ReserveOnOrder mode.
        • PriceChangedException if the price, tax or shipping of some line items changed since the items were added to the cart.
